channel.title: How to remove the flames at the Client Background
channel.description: Hey, I already searched this in the search bar, well, maybe I fail with it, but I didn't find a good guide for this. I edited the Client Background, but there are still these Flame graphics in the background, and I want to delete them. Could anyone help me with this?

item.title: How to remove the flames at the Client Background
item.dc:creator: @kryst-scape kryst-scape
item.description:
@kryst-scape wrote:

Client.java, In your client folder, obviously.
Search for…method58(25106); method58(25106)
Comment them both out.

EDIT: This is only for non-refactored.

Read full topic
item.source: How to remove the flames at the Client Background

item.source: How to remove the flames at the Client Background

item.title: How to remove the flames at the Client Background
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

I’m not sure how to remove them, but I think it has something to do with Config.java in your client.

I don’t know if this will remove them, but try putting this code in your Config.java:

		public static boolean //Everything to do with the login screen.
		loadBackground = false, //Allow the usage of a custom background. Currently set to 'Don't load the original 377 background'.
		loadLogo = false, //Allow the usage of a custom logo. Currently set to 'Don't load the logo'.
		loadFlames = false; //Allow the loading of flames. Currently set to 'Don't load the flames'.

If that doesn’t work…then try:

		public static boolean //Everything to do with the login screen.
		loadBackground = false, //Allow the usage of a custom background. Currently set to 'Don't load the original 377 background'.
		loadLogo = false, //Allow the usage of a custom logo. Currently set to 'Don't load the logo'.
		loadFlames = false; //Allow the loading of flames. Currently set to 'Don't load the flames'.
		public static boolean //Everything to do with Webclient.
		loadAsWebclient = true; //Sets the client as a webclient. (Unused)

Remember to compile. ;D

Read full topic
item.source: How to remove the flames at the Client Background
